title: ARAM isn't random...

replies.body: I used to get anivia and galio very often. I believe there is weighting going on towards champions you play, or a certain type of champion.

Aram was never  "true" random. Mirror matches dont happen on aram and free week champs skew random results. Besides that, its not pulling from all characters at once.

Its been a few years and there isa massive amount of aram accounts now. Riot needs to make some changes because aram is half the reason I play now a days
